mapper.select: select e.*, d.dname, d.loc from emp e, dept d where e.deptno=d.deptno order by e.ename asc
mapper.insert: insert into emp (String empno, String ename, String job, String mgr, String hiredate, String sal, String comm, String deptno) values (#{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, #{hiredate}, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno})
